header.title: Death Note
header.description: Light Yagami finds a notebook that kills anyone whose name is written in it.

list.title: Baccano!
list.description: A group of immortals in the 1930s fight for control of a powerful elixir.

list.title: Hellsing Ultimate
list.description: The Hellsing Organization fights against supernatural threats.

list.title: Higurashi
list.description: A group of friends in a small town are caught in a time loop.

list.title: Monster
list.description: A doctor hunts down a former patient who has become a serial killer.
